titleStmt.title: Musica Oxoniensis a collection of songs for one and two voices, with the thorough-bass / publish'd by Francis Smith and Peter de Walpergen ...
titleStmt.author: Goodson, Richard, 1655-1718. Orpheus and Euridice. Selections.
Weldon, John, 1676-1736. When charming Teraminta.
De Walpergen, Peter.
Smith, Francis, d. 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leon. Lichfield ... and are to be sold by John Walsh ... and John Hare ... at his shop in ... London,

notesStmt.note: Four songs by Goodson and Weldon.
Another issue in 1698 with slightly different imprint. Cf. Day and Murrie, Songbooks; Wing S4028.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
